dmca.title: Picklesisters.com Complains Blog Infringes Copyright
dmca.body:
Copyright Violation Report
Submitted by [redacted]
Owner: www.picklesisters.com
Inquiry Number: 122119

Google Inc,
Attn: Blogger, DMCA complaints
[redacted]
Mountain View, CA 94043

1.	An image in this blog http://rika.blogspot.com/archives/2003_05_01_rika_archive.html (see attached), laundry.jpg, is from my personal collection and I have not given permission for it to be used in this blog.

2. laundry.jpg has been posted in the Systems of Order project, in the picklesisters web site since 1998 and continues to be posted in the site. The page on which it is posted http://www.picklesisters.com/room3.htm (see attached) specifies that the page material is copyright and all rights are reserved.
 
3.		Contact information (email address): [redacted]@earthlink.net

4. "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

5. "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification i s accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of  an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

6.  Signature:
